amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that an institution which is not a TARP recipient will not be subject to the requirements of the bill as a result of doing business with a TARP recipient.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-71 to clarify that an institution that is not a TARP recipient will not be subject to the requirements of the bill as a result of doing business with a TARP recipient.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bilirakis amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Bilirakis.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bilirakis amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
